title: Integrated Text Chat and Audio Interaction Design for Second Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic second language proficiency and foundational professional vocabulary
context.additional_context: Blended learning design that simultaneously enhances second language acquisition and job-specific expertise in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can respond to feedback correcting lexical errors occurring during audio interactions with 80% accuracy via text chat
Learners can complete 70% or more of domain-specific (e.g., technical/medical) conversational tasks by combining real-time text chat and audio modes
Learners can write a weekly self-reflection report based on language accuracy and fluency measured in formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
